name: Longvinter
author: imkringle@proton.me
description: Fish, farm, craft, gather, cook, loot or steal from other players and build a campsite or a village with your friends in an open-world multiplayer sandbox game without rules!

installation.script:
# SteamCMD Script Edited for Longvinter
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/parkervcp/installers:debian'
# Massive credit to TuEye on GitHub for this bit. Saved me a lot of headache in getting this put together; you're a real one

#Installing Dependencies
curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/github/git-lfs/script.deb.sh | bash
apt -y install git-lfs

#Setting user as Anonymous by default
if [[ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]] || [[ "${STEAM_PASS}" == "" ]]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

# Download and install SteamCMD
cd /tmp
mkdir -p "/mnt/server/steamcmd" "/mnt/server/steamapps"
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

# Install game server using SteamCMD
./steamcmd.sh "+login \"${STEAM_USER}\" \"${STEAM_PASS}\"" +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${SRCDS_EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit

# Set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so
# Set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

#Linux Support from Git
# If not using auto update and gamedir exist, remove it
if [ ! "${AUTO_UPDATE}" ] && [ -d "/mnt/server/longvinter-linux-server" ]; then
    echo -e "\nDelete game dir\n"
    rm -r /mnt/server/longvinter-linux-server
fi

# Clone Longvinter Dedicated Server repo or do auto update if activated
cd /mnt/server/
if [ ! -d "/mnt/server/longvinter-linux-server" ]; then
    git clone "https://github.com/Uuvana-Studios/longvinter-linux-server.git"
elif [ "${AUTO_UPDATE}" ]; then
    echo -e "\nUpdating gamefiles\n"
    cd /mnt/server/longvinter-linux-server
    git config pull.rebase false
    git restore .
    git stash
    git pull "https://github.com/Uuvana-Studios/longvinter-linux-server.git" main
fi


# Check for a Game.ini, if it is missing; create it
TARGET_FILE="Game.ini"

cd /mnt/server/longvinter-linux-server/Longvinter/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/
if test -f "$TARGET_FILE"; then
    echo "$TARGET_FILE exists. Skipping config install"
else
    echo "$TARGET_FILE does not exist. Installing!"
    curl -sSL -o Game.ini https://pteropaste.com/83jal15tpvwl/
    echo "$TARGET_FILE has been installed"
    cd /mnt/server
fi

#Making the files executable
chmod -R ugo+rwx /mnt/server/longvinter-linux-server/


## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Longvinter Installation completed"
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.description: If blank no password is required to connect

Enable/disable tent decay to make sure there isn't an abundant number of abandoned tents in the server.
// True - False

variables.description: Max number of Tents that can be on the server

variables.description: Updates gamefiles when reinstalling. Otherwise the server is freshly installed and you will loose your savegames.
